@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The Composite is a generic container widget. It exposes all methods to set layouts and to manage child widgets as public methods. You must configure this widget with a layout manager to define the way the widget's children are positioned. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 


   var composite = new qx.ui.mobile.container.Composite();
   composite.setLayout(new qx.ui.mobile.layout.HBox());

   composite.add(new qx.ui.mobile.basic.Label("Name: "), {flex:1});
   composite.add(new qx.ui.mobile.form.TextField());
   this.getRoot().add(composite);

This example horizontally groups a label and text field by using a Composite configured with a horizontal box layout as a container.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
layout {qx.ui.mobile.layout.Abstract?null} The layout that should be used for this
     container
@param.description:
The layout that should be used for this
     container

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the children list

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.ui.core.Widget[]} The children array (Arrays are
   reference types, please do not modify them in-place)
@return.description:
The children array (Arrays are
   reference types, please do not modify them in-place)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the widget contains children.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Returns true when the widget has children.
@return.description: Returns true when the widget has children.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the index position of the given widget if it is a child widget. Otherwise it returns -1.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.Widget} the widget to query for
@param.description: the widget to query for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.
@return.description: The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a new child widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.Widget} the widget to add.
@param.description: the widget to add.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: layoutProperties {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.
@param.description: Optional layout data for widget.

@param.description: Index, at which the widget will be inserted

@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.
@param.description: Optional layout data for widget.

@description.body: Remove all children.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set a layout manager for the widget. A a layout manager can only be connected with one widget. Reset the connection with a previous widget first, if you like to use it in another widget instead.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: layout {qx.ui.mobile.layout.Abstract} The new layout or null to reset the layout.
@param.description: The new layout or null to reset the layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the widget's layout manager.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
